name: Grave Digging Me
description:
Get your grave looting the dead on. while expanding the 20 town blocks, as each block unlock gets you better loot and 12 graveyard plots to unlock.


As the new grave digger, you want to get right tool out of the 8 shovels to chose for the job and 2 upgrades to unlock.



Repair the town chaos with some grave digging.
